changeSet.sql:
DELETE FROM product_quantity WHERE id in ( SELECT DISTINCT pq.id FROM market m, product_quantity pq JOIN product_yearly_prices pyp ON pyp.id = pq.product_yearly_prices_id JOIN category pt ON pt.id = pyp.product_type_id WHERE pq.market_id = m.id AND pt.dtype='ProductType' AND pt.market_type_id != m.type_id );
DELETE FROM product_price WHERE id in ( SELECT DISTINCT pp.id FROM market m, product_price pp JOIN product_yearly_prices pyp ON pyp.id = pp.product_yearly_prices_id JOIN category pt ON pt.id = pyp.product_type_id WHERE pp.market_id = m.id AND pt.dtype='ProductType' AND pt.market_type_id != m.type_id )

delete.where: price_type_id != (select id from category where dtype='PriceType' and name='retail-price')
